# Bullet list layout

Layout that reveals individual bullet points. It demonstrates how layouts can
react to slide navigation.

```
 +-----------------------+
 |                       |
 |  - 1. bullet point    |
 |  - 2. bullet point    |
 |                       |
 |                       |
 +-----------------------+
```

## CSS classes

The content is wrapped in the CSS class `.BulletList-wrapper`.

## Example

```yaml
---
toc: Bullet list example
layout: BulletList
---
- First bullet point
- Second bullet point
```
